findings.title: Owner can change _maxWalletToken and _maxTxAmount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify _maxWalletToken and _maxTxAmount variables.

findings.title: Owner can change sellMultiplier
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the sellMultiplier variable.

findings.title: Owner can change trading
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the trading status.

findings.title: Owner can change blacklist mode
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change blacklist mode.

findings.title: Owner can change maxRoomRent value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maxRoomRent value.

findings.title: Owner can change cooldown settings
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify cooldown settings.

findings.title: Owner can multiTransfer fixed and listed token amounts
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to transfer fixed and listed token amounts, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to withdraw contract BNBs.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from dividends
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude certain addresses from receiving dividends, which could lead to unfair distribution of funds.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from fee, timelock and transaction amount
findings.description: Authorized addresses have excessive privileges to modify critical contract settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change fees
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to modify fee settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change fee receivers
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify fee receivers, which could lead to unauthorized changes to the contract's revenue distribution.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change swap threshold and disable/enable swap
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to modify swap settings, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change targetLiquidity
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify the target liquidity settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution criteria
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify the distribution criteria, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution GAS
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify distribution GAS settings.
